Package cams.view

Class CommonElements

java.lang.Object
cams.view.CommonElements
public class CommonElements extends Object
Utility class providing common text elements used by classes of the view package.
Since:
2023-11-23
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen

    • getHeader

      public static String getHeader()
      Returns the CAMs application header consisting of the CAMs application logo in between two separators. Example: 
       
 ═════════════════════════════════════════════

       ██████╗ █████╗ ███╗   ███╗███████╗
      ██╔════╝██╔══██╗████╗ ████║██╔════╝
      ██║     ███████║██╔████╔██║███████╗
      ██║     ██╔══██║██║╚██╔╝██║╚════██║
      ╚██████╗██║  ██║██║ ╚═╝ ██║███████║
       ╚═════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝

 ═════════════════════════════════════════════
      Returns:
      the CAMs application header

    • getHeader

      public static String getHeader(String status)
      Returns the CAMs application header consisting of the CAMs application logo in between two separators with a label displayed on the bottom separator. Example: 
       
 ═════════════════════════════════════════════

       ██████╗ █████╗ ███╗   ███╗███████╗
      ██╔════╝██╔══██╗████╗ ████║██╔════╝
      ██║     ███████║██╔████╔██║███████╗
      ██║     ██╔══██║██║╚██╔╝██║╚════██║
      ╚██████╗██║  ██║██║ ╚═╝ ██║███████║
       ╚═════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝

 ═══ Status ══════════════════════════════════
      Parameters:
      status - label to be displayed
      Returns:
      the CAMs application header with the label

    • getStatusBar

      public static String getStatusBar(String status)
      Returns a separator with a label displayed on it. Example: 
       
 ═══ Status ══════════════════════════════════
      Parameters:
      status - label to be displayed
      Returns:
      separator with label

    • clearSystemOut

      public static void clearSystemOut()
      Clears the standard output; usually used before displaying a new Displayable user interface element.
